wrynn_dialog_0.content: Hello! I see you stumbled in without knocking, that's great!

wrynn_dialog_1.content: Joking of course, but hey, since you're here I could use your help.

wrynn_dialog_2.content: Well, recently, I went down into my cellar, and to my surprise a few undesirable critters decided to move in! In my haste to get the hell out of there I left behind my recipe book.

wrynn_dialog_3.content: If you go down there and retrieve it for me I could provide you with the best food you've ever had! Of course I can provide you with some weapons, I'm not that crazy (yet)

wrynn_dialog_4.content: Great! Walk over to my storage, I have a weapon and some food in there. Come back and speak with me once you have them.
wrynn_dialog_4.waitContent: My storage is unlocked, feel free to go grab your items.

wrynn_dialog_5.content: You got them? Good! The cellar is right outside, the two double doors in the ground. Come back when you've found it, good luck!

wrynn_dialog_6.content: Please hurry. I'm dying without my daily indulgence of bread.
